bio:
Rargal Thrallmaster is a Nord vampire member of the Volkihar Clan.
Rargal Thrallmaster tends to the various Vampire Cattle found in Castle Volkihar. He reveals that he captures them from all over Skyrim and tries to keep a wide selection for every taste. He warns the Dragonborn not to kill any, or else there will be consequences.
name: Rargal Thrallmaster
